data.title: Evangelos Venizelos on LinkedIn: Want to join a dynamic team of professionals, gain insight and acquire…
data.meta_description: Want to join a dynamic team of professionals, gain insight and acquire unique and diversified skills through a variety of assignments within Financial…
data.text:
Let us introduce you to Maria! She recently completed our PwC Greece FS Rotational Graduate Program and she’s sharing with us her experience. Want to accelerate your career and become ACA/ACCA qualified at the same time? 𝐀𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐲 𝐧𝐨𝐰! 👉 https://bit.ly/3YIHoqM #TheNewEquation #PwCGreece #graduatecareers #JoinOurCommunityOfSolvers

Evangelos Venizelos, Partner Assurance, was part of "Μονοπάτια Σταδιοδρομίας" virtual event, where he introduced our brand new Graduate Rotational Program in Financial Services. This is a three-years length program, that offers young professionals the opportunity to develop their #skills through high scale projects, having the chance to work in rotation assignments between #Assurance and #Advisory teams. Learn more here: http://pwc.to/3dFwjls #WeArePwC

Congratulations to our three new Partners Evangelos Venizelos, George Kollidas and Panos Takopoulos, FCCA who joined the PwC Partnership and will continue to contribute in their service lines and industry sectors. We are #PwCProud of our newly admitted Partners as they represent the next generation of leaders who will support our commitment to build trust in society and solve important problems.

We are proud to see the closing today of one of the most significant, complex and economy changing Greek banking transactions, by our long-standing client Eurobank with doValue. Since early 2018, PwC's team has been at the heart of this Deal right from the unique idea initiation, the business conceptualization, the detailed technical design, the operational restructuring all the way through to realization and implementation. We are happy to be making a difference by reimagining the possible. #banking #economy #pwcproud
